name: TV Shows Set in Hawaii Quiz | Things in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: This show had a 12-year run about the cases involving a special police force answering only to the Governor of Hawaii.
questions.explanation:
Hawaii Five-O.

	With some of the best theme music ever!

questions.text: This very short-lived 1998 show, said to be like Dynasty, starred Bo Derek and Lee Horsley.
questions.explanation:
Wind on Water.

	Only two episodes were shown.

Teacher and widower Sam Byrd (Timothy Busfield) moves his family to Hawaii to start a new life.
Vietnam veteran works as head of security to a recluse author. He's also a private investigator who gets helps from some of his war-time buddies.
